description: Hike from the Mt Seymour parking lot to Broughton Peak.  The trail follows the main line up the mountain and ends up with a beautiful view of downtown Vancouver.
directions: Follow Hwy 1 over the Second Narrows Bridge.  Take the Mt Seymour exit.  Follow along that road for about 4 km then take a left onto Mt Seymour Rd all the way to the top.  The trail head is at the end of the parking lot.
title: Broughton Peak
